I’m back again to share something interesting.Roughly a week after taking the 1g dose, I started having multiple anxiety attacks unlike anything I’ve ever had before, including some constant brain fog, and a feeling of disconnect. Long Story short, your gut is your second brain, and most of the serotonin receptors are in the gut.This drug gets rid of the good and bad bacteria in your gut which CAN effect mental health. While my reason for taking the drug was sound, maybe try something else if you for sure have anxiety, otherwise, probiotics and CBD. I’ve been eating yogurt, taking probiotic capsules (Whole Foods sells them) eating healthier, sleeping more, exercising, and my anxiety is under better control, but it’s still there...for now. It’s been said that these feelings can last a month for the unlucky, so take good care of yourself.
